segments.text: I just discovered that I owe $ 10 for a movie that I never ordered .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me check , sir . You were charged for watching ' Titanic ' Monday night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is absolutely incorrect ! I was out on the town Monday night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , sir , bear with me a moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for taking my word over the computer's word .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One slight problem , sir . I need to charge you $ 2 to remove this error from your file .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Absolutely unbelievable ! You people should be ashamed of yourselves .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree with you , sir , but all I do is work here .
segments.speaker: S2
